name: oncoanalyser-targeted-panel
title: Targeted Panel Cancer Analysis
description: Somatic variant calling from targeted cancer gene panels. Optimized for hotspot mutations, small panels, and clinical diagnostic assays. Samplesheet format: `sample_id,sample_type,sequence_type,filetype,filepath`
content:
Targeted Panel Somatic Variant Calling

Analyze cancer gene panels (50-500 genes) with clinical-grade somatic variant calling. Optimized for hotspot mutation detection in FFPE samples and clinical diagnostics.

Why Targeted Panels?

  • Cost-Effective: Sequence only cancer-relevant genes
  • High Coverage: 1000-5000X depth for low-frequency variants
  • FFPE Compatible: Works with degraded clinical samples
  • Fast Turnaround: Results in hours, not days
  • Low DNA Input: 10-50ng sufficient for most panels
  • Clinical Validation: Easier to validate than WGS

Common Cancer Panels

  • Foundation Medicine: FoundationOne CDx (324 genes)
  • MSK-IMPACT: 468 cancer genes
  • Tempus xT: 648 genes
  • Guardant360: 74-83 genes (liquid biopsy)
  • Oncomine: Comprehensive Cancer Panel
  • Custom Panels: Institution-specific gene sets

Optimized Detection

  • Hotspot Mutations: EGFR, KRAS, BRAF, PIK3CA
  • Low VAF Detection: Detect 1-5% allele fractions
  • Small Indels: EGFR exon 19 deletions, etc.
  • Gene Amplifications: ERBB2, MET, FGFR
  • Gene Fusions: ALK, ROS1, RET, NTRK (if RNA included)

Clinical Use Cases

  • Treatment Selection: Match mutations to targeted therapies
  • Resistance Testing: Acquired resistance mutations
  • Liquid Biopsy: ctDNA monitoring
  • Minimal Residual Disease: Post-treatment monitoring
  • Clinical Trial Eligibility: Biomarker screening
  • Companion Diagnostics: FDA-approved drug matching

Advantages Over WGS

Depth: 1000-5000X vs 30-60X in WGS

Sensitivity: Detect variants down to 1-2% VAF

Cost: $300-800 vs $1000-2000 for WGS

Speed: 1-2 days vs 1-2 weeks

Simplicity: Easier interpretation, focused on actionable genes

Input Requirements

CSV samplesheet with tumor-normal pairs or tumor-only samples. Supports FASTQ or BAM input.

Key Outputs

  • Somatic SNVs/Indels: All detected variants
  • Actionable Mutations: Therapy-matched variants
  • Gene Amplifications: CNV for panel genes
  • Variant Annotations: ClinVar, COSMIC, OncoKB
  • Clinical Report: Therapy recommendations

Perfect for: Clinical diagnostics • Hotspot screening • FFPE samples • Liquid biopsy • Treatment selection
